name: Escape the lab (itch) (Sir_Squiggle)
description:
This game is my first try at a game jam.

In it you are Jerry, a slime that wants to escape the lab he was born in.

Use his ability to momentarly transform into an object (press SPACE), and not get caught. Exept from that, navigate this short platformer with the WASD keys.

This was made in 3 days in the Godot Engine for the Weekly Game Jam, the theme was "Camouflage". It's also one of my first game ever, so sorry if it's not that great.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated.
